alert.note: Alert for Chuckwalla Valley; Palo Verde Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 12:29AM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern La Paz, San Bernardino and Riverside Counties through 115 AM MST/115 AM PDT/... At 1227 AM MST/1227 AM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Wenden to 13 miles northwest of Quartzsite. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parker, Quartzsite, Bouse, Wenden, Salome and Poston. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 72 between mile markers 14 and 43. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 111 and 151. CA Route 95 between mile markers 17 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
